www.kitablet.in

MessageTemplate.Name: Parent.Registration.Email
MessageTemplate.Description: Mail for new parent import from excel
MessageTemplate.Subject: Kitablet: Request for registration and activation
MessageTemplate.Body:
Dear Parent,

We are happy to welcome you and your child to Kitablet, the e-Library of best of Indian children's literature.

We have created an account for you and your child. You are required to activate the same.

You will be able to activate your child's account from your active parent account on Kitablet. If you haven't activated your account, you can do it here:%TOKENURL%

If you have an active parent account, please go to the following link to complete the activation process for your child:%SITEURL%

After you have activated your child's account, he/she will be able to access Kitablet through the Kitablet App for laptops/desktops and tablets. It works on Windows, Android and Apple devices. The app can be downloaded from the respective store - links for the same are mentioned here.

You can continue accessing your parent account on Kitablet at %SITEURL% to stay up-to-date with your child's usage of Kitablet. Please note that you will be able to manage accounts for all of your children from your single parent account as long as the specified parent email id for them is the same.

If you have any query, contact us at support@kitablet.in.

Thanks,

Team Kitablet

www.kitablet.in

MessageTemplate.Name: Username.Recovery.Email
MessageTemplate.Subject: Kitablet:Username recovery
MessageTemplate.Body:
Dear %FIRSTNAME%,

Greetings from Team Kitablet!

This is in response to your request to retreive your user name on Kitablet. The user name registered with us at the specified email id is: %TOKENURL%

In case you do not have the website open, you can access it here: %SITEURL%

If you have any query, contact us at support@kitablet.in.

Thanks,

Team Kitablet

www.kitablet.in

MessageTemplate.Name: ParentUsername.Recovery.Email
MessageTemplate.Description: Mail for new parent import from excel
MessageTemplate.Subject: Kitablet: Request for User name
MessageTemplate.Body:

Greetings from Team Kitablet!

%TOKENURL%

Children's accounts can be accessed through the eReader app and parent's accounts can be accessed through the Kitablet Server here.

If you have any query, contact us at support@kitablet.in.

Thanks,

Team Kitablet

www.kitablet.in

MessageTemplate.Name: Help.Acknowledgement.Student.Email
MessageTemplate.Description: Mail for sending acknowledgement of help item for user
MessageTemplate.Subject: Kitablet: Query submitted through the App
MessageTemplate.Body:
Dear Parent,

Greetings from Team Kitablet!

We have received a query from your child, %STUDENTFIRSTNAME% %STUDENTLASTNAME%, through the 'Contact us' section of the eReader.

The query is specified below. Our Support Team will respond to it soon

The Reference ID for the query is :%REFERENCEID%. You may need it for future reference.

You have received this email as this email id is specified as the parent email id for the abovementioned child. If you have any questions, do write to us at support@kitablet.in.

Thanks,

Team Kitablet

www.kitablet.in

Query Text:
%QUERY%

Team Kitablet

MessageTemplate.Name: Student.Registration.Email

MessageTemplate.Subject: Kitablet: Request for activation
MessageTemplate.Body:
Dear Parent,

We are happy to welcome your child to Kitablet, the e-Library of best of Indian children's literature.

We have created an account for your child. Please go to the following link to complete the activation process for your child:%SITEURL%

After you have activated your child's account, he/she will be able to access Kitablet through the Kitablet App for laptops/desktops and tablets. It works on Windows, Android and Apple devices. The app can be downloaded from the respective store - links for the same are mentioned here.

You can continue accessing your parent account on Kitablet at %SITEURL% to stay up-to-date with your child's usage of Kitablet. Please note that you will be able to manage accounts for all of your children from your single parent account as long as the specified parent email id for them is the same.

If you have any query, contact us at support@kitablet.in.

Thanks,

Team Kitablet

MessageTemplate.Name: Parent.Import.Email
MessageTemplate.Description: Mail for new parent and children import from excel
MessageTemplate.Subject: Kitablet: Login details for your account
MessageTemplate.Body:
Dear Parent,

You can also see the report on usage of Kitablet by your child here:
%SITEURL%Report8

Please use these credentials to sign in:

Username: %PARENTUSERNAME%
Password: %PARENTPASSWORD%

Please feel free to write back to us at support@kitablet.in for any queries.

Cheers,
Team Kitablet

MessageTemplate.Name: Student.Import.Email
MessageTemplate.Description: Mail for existing parent and children import from excel
MessageTemplate.Subject: Kitablet: Login details for your child
MessageTemplate.Body:
Dear Parent,

Welcome to Kitablet, an e-library of the best of Indian literature for children.

Your child can log in to their account using the credentials given below:

Username: %STUDENTUSERNAME%
Password: %STUDENTPASSWORD%

(Do remind your child to set a new password by going to the "My Profile" section)

Kitablet has a browser and an App version.

Please click here to start reading on the browsers!

You can see details for the App version of Kitablet here.

Presently, we are unavailable on smartphones.

For any queries, write to us at support@kitablet.in.

Happy Reading!

Cheers,
Team Kitablet
